"Partner's Friendship Level":
"If you clear a quest with a partner character, or if you complete one of their client orders, that character's Friendship Level will go up.

Your partner's Friendship Level can be found in the Campship from the \"Partner List\" at the \"Partner Terminal\".""" text02#0,"As your partner's Friendship Level goes up the \""Present Gauge\"" will also go up.

When that \""Present Gauge\"" maxes out
column3:
that character will give you their present.

A \""present icon\"" will show above the partner's head.

The \""present icon\"" also shown beside \""Talk\"".
Select \""Talk\"" to get the present."""
